name: Social Interaction Anxiety Scale
description: A 20-item self-report scale measuring anxiety in social interaction situations. Assesses fears of being inarticulate, boring, or being ignored in social situations.
reference: Mattick, R. P., & Clarke, J. C. (1998). Development and validation of measures of social phobia scrutiny fear and social interaction anxiety. Behaviour Research and Therapy, 36(4), 455-470.
instructions: For each item, please indicate the degree to which you feel the statement is characteristic or true for you.

questions.name: sias_1
questions.description: I get nervous if I have to speak with someone in authority (teacher, boss, etc.).

questions.name: sias_2
questions.description: I have difficulty making eye contact with others.

questions.name: sias_3
questions.description: I become tense if I have to talk about myself or my feelings.

questions.name: sias_4
questions.description: I find it difficult to mix comfortably with the people I work with.

questions.name: sias_5
questions.description: I find it easy to make friends my own age.

questions.name: sias_6
questions.description: I tense up if I meet an acquaintance on the street.

questions.name: sias_7
questions.description: When mixing socially, I am uncomfortable.

questions.name: sias_8
questions.description: I feel tense if I am alone with just one other person.

questions.name: sias_9
questions.description: I am at ease meeting people at parties, etc.

questions.name: sias_10
questions.description: I have difficulty talking with other people.

questions.name: sias_11
questions.description: I find it easy to think of things to talk about.

questions.name: sias_12
questions.description: I worry about expressing myself in case I appear awkward.

questions.name: sias_13
questions.description: I find it difficult to disagree with another's point of view.

questions.name: sias_14
questions.description: I have difficulty talking to attractive persons of the opposite sex.

questions.name: sias_15
questions.description: I find myself worrying that I won't know what to say in social situations.

questions.name: sias_16
questions.description: I am nervous mixing with people I don't know well.

questions.name: sias_17
questions.description: I feel I'll say something embarrassing when talking.

questions.name: sias_18
questions.description: When mixing in a group, I find myself worrying I will be ignored.

questions.name: sias_19
questions.description: I am tense mixing in a group.

questions.name: sias_20
questions.description: I am unsure whether to greet someone I know only slightly.
